Recognizing these realities, my amendment to the FY19 NDAA gave @POTUS until January to make a final determination of whether Russia is in material breach of its INF obligations. In the event of a positive material breach determination, the amendment set a path to exit the treaty

Meanwhile, China has never been part of the treaty and has amassed an arsenal over 2,000 ballistic and cruise missiles‚Äîabout 95% of which fall under INF ranges. These missiles are far cheaper than our ships and planes, meaning we are increasingly priced out of the competition.

First Step Act allows lengthy criminal histories to get reduced sentences, & adds massive, dangerous loophole. Today, ‚Äòsafety valve‚Äô in fed law allows fed judges to ignore mandatory minimums and sentence certain defendants to reduced time. It‚Äôs meant for rare, truly first-time cases, so one condition is defendant must have no or very limited state or fed criminal history.

First Step Act says crimes are ‚Äúserious violent felonies‚Äù only if prisoner served 12+ months. Brock Turner, who served just 3 months for sexual assault, is not a ‚Äúserious violent felon‚Äù under the jailbreak bill. Here is why that matters.
